entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
